original_title: Amanda Knox and Monica Lewinsky just might be the team-up people didn’t know they needed | CNN
article_summary: Amanda Knox and Monica Lewinsky, both known for past public shaming, are collaborating as executive producers on Hulu's "The Twisted Tale of Amanda Knox." The series, debuting on Wednesday, explores Knox's wrongful imprisonment in Italy and her subsequent fight for innocence. Knox and Lewinsky bonded over their shared experiences of being publicly scrutinized and losing their identities.</s>
